name: GRAZES
description:
- GRAZES - CONTROLS:

1. WASD or LEFT STICK  - To Move

2. HOLD SHIFT or Xbox A - To slowdown movement

3. Xbox A - To continue through Menus.

GOAL OF THE GAME:

Survive for as long as possible!

If you touch an obstacle (red square) you die! If the timer runs out you die!

Getting close to obstacles but not touching them will extend your timer and increase your high-score.

Have fun!
